statistics.title: M-IoT
statistics.subtitle: The IoT platform that facilitates visual restitution of data collected by your connected objects
statistics.description: M-IoT is an intuitive and turnkey platform that allows you to visualize your object data on personalized and dynamic dashboards.

widgets.title: Data valorization with a wide choice of customizable widgets
widgets.description: Access numerical indicators, graphs, maps, gauges, timelines...

access_rights.description: Save time by simply managing all your users' rights.

branding.title: Interface customization to your brand

value_proposition.title: M-IoT
value_proposition.subtitle: How to valorize and enrich your data flows?
value_proposition.description1: An IoT (Internet of Things) platform plays a central role by bringing together data and communications from connected objects. Its primary objective: simplify the collection, storage and processing of indicators derived from data, to better manage the connected environment and even automate its operations.
value_proposition.description2: Are you considering leveraging your data through an IoT platform? Take a moment to explore the operating mode characterizing this type of ecosystem.
